name: Big Guy, Lil Guy(Team Worldstar)
description:
For the UKIE game jam #raisethegamejam , our team, Team Worldstar, decided to celebrate the diversity of bodies. With this idea in mind we created Big Guy, Lil Guy. In our game you play as two characters that you can change between smoothly, Big Guy and Lil Guy. Big Guy can jump far and run fast but he can’t reach into the small gaps that Lil Guy can. These two need to work together to escape the lab where they have been experimented on. Take control of the two characters and help them to escape but beware of lasers, spikes and crushing objects! Make sure to use your teamwork to escape safely. We created this game because we believe that one of the most diverse things about humans is our bodies! We come in all shapes, sizes and colours each with our own experiences and struggles. We wanted people to know that just because they aren’t the tallest, strongest or best looking it doesn’t mean they are worthless. Hopefully people can play this game, have fun, forget about their worries and be proud of who they are.
#raisethegamejam
Credits:
Juliano- Team Leader/Programmer
Abu Bakr- Co-Leader/Programmer/QA Tester
Wafi- Lead Artist
Rovee- Programmer/Animation

Music: www.bensound.com
